name: RevelationTrestan-尸忆岛
description: "RevelationTrestan" is a large VR game. The player plays a safety captain who is injured in an accident and causes temporary memory loss. When the player completes the mission in the game, he will face the zombie attack, the threat of the giant beast, and the puzzles of each level. In the process, the memory is gradually restored, and the truth is getting closer.
